block_comment: This block of code is used to implement a data pattern generator using PRBS (Pseudo Random Binary Sequence) or ALL pattern. The control of this block is asserted with the enable signal, "data_clk_en", which is active when the FIFO is ready, the data is ready, and the user burst count is more than one. A PRBS generator/data pattern generator is instantiated and takes the input signals "clk_i", "rst_i", and a seeding signal amongst others, then it outputs the PRBS data "prbs_o". This block can be useful for simulating random data transmission scenarios.
